stages.logText: I found two not very bright brothers in a cellar of their house. They seemed to be talking about some sinister plan.
They were planning to destroy the great dam of Brimhaven. They just could not agree how they would do it.
They asked me to help them.
I have agreed to destroy the dam for them.
The brothers gave me a hand axe that could weaken the dam in a vulnerable place.
I took another hand axe. This time I shouldn't lose it.
I found the weak spot in the dam and started hacking at the wood.
Water came pouring through the hole in the dam. A lot of water!
I refused to destroy the dam for the brothers.
Given what I overheard, I was not allowed to leave. The two brothers attacked me.
Someone else destroyed the dam and water came pouring through a hole in the dam. A lot of water!
The Brimhaven guards have informed me that I may not leave the city until they have investigated who destroyed the dam.
I have promised to track down the real perpetrators. However, I still cannot not leave the city.
The two brothers did not know their boss's name, but he seemed to have a lot of gold.
The rich man living up on the hill of Brimhaven seemed to know more than he admitted.
The rich man boasted that he had been bribed by an important man in Loneford to sabotage the dam.
I gave the letters as a piece of evidence to the captain of the guard. Now it is up to them to deal with the rich man.
The dam is very important to Brimhaven. It should be repaired.

Stebbarik was ill at home in bed. He could not work and feared that he would lose his job. Because of his high debts, he feared that Gnossath would then take his house away.
I have offered to do the work for Stebbarik.
Gnossath has asked me to carry 25 heavy boulders from the stock to the dam.
I have carried the first boulder to the dam.
I have carried 5 boulders to the dam.
I have moved 10 boulders.
I have moved 15 boulders. This work is exhausting!
Only a few to go...
Finally - that was the last boulder! Gnossath was very pleased with my work.
I heard noices from the back room but I was not allowed to enter because I didn't know the password.
Zimsko told me about gambling in the back room and that he lost a lot of money. He thinks that they are cheating.
I told Zimsko that I want to find out more about the gambling and he told me the password to access the back room.
I have to win and lose a few times until they trust me and play for higher amounts. Then they start cheating.
With the password, I was allowed to enter the back room.
They trust me and now and are playing for higher amounts.
After I accused the dealer of cheating, a tavern brawl started.
All the people involved in the tavern brawl survived, but I am no longer allowed to enter the back room.
I told Zimsko that I believe the gamblers are cheating.
I told Zimsko that I believe the gamblers are not cheating.
